flawed_nl_solution:
The first and last guard will take 3 + 2 = <<3+2=3>>3 hours of the night shift.
There are 9 hours in the night shift, so the middle two guards will cover 9 - 3 = <<9-3=6>>6 hours.
Each middle guard will take 6 / 2 = <<6/2=3>>3 hours.
#### 3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
